result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cleophus Torry Sr

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on January 23, 2023 at 02:30 pm.

11:18 AM Defendant Cleophus Torry Sr in court with Attorney Devonte D Windham.  ADA Colleen Lennon in court for the State of Wisconsin. Rob Csencsics from Dane County Pretrial Services appeared in the Courtroom.
RE: Motion for Bail Modification Hearing Regarding Pretrial Services Remote Breath Test
State requests remote breath monitoring continue and does not request increased bail. Statement by Attorney Windham for remote breath monitoring to be removed for reasons stated on the record. Court does not remote remote breath monitoring at this time. All conditions to remain the same.
Plea and sentencing scheduled, NIH.
DCPS Violation Report and Court's response: a bail hearing is scheduled for 10-11-22 and violation will be addressed at that time.
Bail/bond hearing on October 11, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on October 11, 2022 at 11:00 am.
defense
Status conference on October 7, 2022 at 09:15 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Cleophus Torry Sr
Current: PO Box 45726, Madison, WI 53744 United States  (Effective: 08-11-2022)
Prior: 201 S Park St APt F, Madison, WI 53715

The Court ordered a signature bond on the condition that the defendant reports to and complies with Pretrial Services. The defendant shall report immediately to PTS. The following checked category(s) are also ordered: __ GPS, _X_ Remote Breath (Alcohol) Monitoring, and/or __ Random Drug Testing. 
Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle. 
- Defendant shall not consume or possess alcohol. 
NONCOMPLIANCE WILL BE REPORTED BY DCPS TO THE JUDICIARY WHO SHALL RESPOND IN ONE OF THESE WAYS: Schedule bail hearing, Increase Supervision, Issue warrant, No change but monitor.
PTS Referral Sheet

Defendant Cleophus Torry Sr in court, in custody.  Attorney Carl Lazarus in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Devonte D Windham in court for Cleophus Torry Sr.  Court entered not guilty plea for defendant.  Motions due in 20 days. CT informs parties of wanting defn monitored by PTS on remote breath.  Argument by Atty Windham.  Defn ordered to remote to PTS immediately.
Arraignment on August 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.
